r.d: This is the SQLite MDB2 driver.
r.n:
- fixed bug #12117: disconnect() does not work as documented - fixed bug #13815: incomplete regexp in the Reverse module - fixed bug #13928: Invalid triggers created for 'ON UPDATE' - fixed bug #14302: Connection errors were not always returned
note: open todo items: - fix pattern escaping using GLOB instead of LIKE or create and register own implementation of LIKE
